vernac_cmds: Require Import L Encodings DecidableRecognisable Markov Enumerable.
Implicit Types P Q : term -> Prop.
Definition computable_gen X Y (xenc : X -> term) (yenc : Y -> term) f := exists u, proc u /\ forall s, u (xenc s) ▷ (yenc (f s)).
Definition computable_fun f := computable_gen tenc tenc f.
Record mreducible P Q : Prop := { f : term -> term ; f_red : forall s, P s <-> Q (f s) ; f_comp : computable_fun f ; }.
Notation "P ⪯ Q" := (mreducible P Q) (at level 40, no associativity).
Lemma mreducible_sane P Q : mreducible P Q <-> exists u, proc u /\ forall s, exists t, u (tenc s) ▷ tenc t /\ (P s <-> Q t).
assert (forall s, exists t, u (tenc s) ▷ tenc t) as [f ?] % L_computable_computable by firstorder.
intros P Q R [f1 H1 [u1 []]] [f2 H3 [u2 []]].
Lemma mreducible_ext P Q P' Q' : (forall s, P s <-> P' s) -> (forall s, Q s <-> Q' s) -> P ⪯ Q -> P' ⪯ Q'.
Lemma mreducible_comp P Q : P ⪯ Q -> (fun s => ~ P s) ⪯ (fun s => ~ Q s).
Lemma mreducible_comp_conv : (forall P Q, (fun s => ~ P s) ⪯ (fun s => ~ Q s) -> P ⪯ Q) -> Markov_Eva.
eapply mreducible_ext with (P := (fun s0 : term => ~ eva s0)) (Q := (fun s0 : term => ~ eva s0)); try reflexivity.
Lemma mreducible_dec P Q : decidable Q -> P ⪯ Q -> decidable P.
assert (lambda (u (v 0)) (tenc s) ≡ u (v (tenc s))) as -> by solveeq.
Lemma mreducible_red P Q s t : Q s -> ~ Q t -> decidable P -> P ⪯ Q.
exists (fun x => if f x then s else t).
assert ((lambda (((u 0) (tenc s)) (tenc t))) (tenc x) ≡ u (tenc x) (tenc s) (tenc t)) as -> by solveeq.
Lemma mreducible_recognisable P Q : recognisable Q -> P ⪯ Q -> recognisable P.
assert (lambda (u (v 0)) (tenc s) ≡ u (v (tenc s))) as -> by solveeq.
Lemma mreducible_full P : P ⪯ (fun s => True) <-> (forall s, P s).
eapply mreducible_ext with (P := fun _ => True) (Q := fun _ => True); firstorder.
Lemma mreducible_empty P : P ⪯ (fun s => False) <-> (forall s, ~ P s).
eapply mreducible_ext with (P := fun _ => False) (Q := fun _ => False); firstorder.
Lemma eva_red : (fun s => eva (s (tenc s))) ⪯ eva.
Lemma recognisable_iff P : recognisable P <-> P ⪯ eva.
Lemma preceq_lub P Q : exists R, P ⪯ R /\ Q ⪯ R /\ forall R', P ⪯ R' -> Q ⪯ R' -> R ⪯ R'.
exists (fun s => match s with app 0 s => P s | app _ s => Q s | s => Q s end).
exists (fun s => match s with | app 0 s => f s | app _ s => g s | _ => g s end).

command: assert (forall s, exists t, u (tenc s) ▷ tenc t) as [f ?] % L_computable_computable by firstorder.
intros P Q R [f1 H1 [u1 []]] [f2 H3 [u2 []]].
eapply mreducible_ext with (P := (fun s0 : term => ~ eva s0)) (Q := (fun s0 : term => ~ eva s0)); try reflexivity.
assert (lambda (u (v 0)) (tenc s) ≡ u (v (tenc s))) as -> by solveeq.
exists (fun x => if f x then s else t).
assert ((lambda (((u 0) (tenc s)) (tenc t))) (tenc x) ≡ u (tenc x) (tenc s) (tenc t)) as -> by solveeq.
assert (lambda (u (v 0)) (tenc s) ≡ u (v (tenc s))) as -> by solveeq.
eapply mreducible_ext with (P := fun _ => True) (Q := fun _ => True); firstorder.
eapply mreducible_ext with (P := fun _ => False) (Q := fun _ => False); firstorder.
exists (fun s => match s with app 0 s => P s | app _ s => Q s | s => Q s end).
exists (fun s => match s with | app 0 s => f s | app _ s => g s | _ => g s end).
